page.title: 07FARMING CONTINUED
page.content: Machines do alot of work but the machine which does the most is the tractor.Other machines include a plough,cultivator,forager,a bailer,a trailer and a harvester. GOOSE FARM GR 634 623 This farm is in Hodsell Street and the owners name is Mrs. Braden.She lives with her daughter and son.The house had been seperated,so that 1 half was just Mrs. Bradens.She also had 5 horses called Cam,Storm,Snowy and two other horses.She also has lots of hens,ducks,turkeys as well. RED COW FARM GR 621 669 The farm is situated on a country lane.The house is 6 hundred years old it is made of wattle and daub.The front door is pointed at the top and is made out of wood.It has an oast house next to it.
